    • handleDragOver

      public void handleDragOver(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent event)
      handleDragOver method allows the interface detecting an image if the image is Draged over the interface the interface accepts any mode of image sending such as copy paste for example
      Parameters:
      DragEvent - event this method has only one parameter if the image is in interaction with the interface then the image is detected

    • handleDrop

      public void handleDrop(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent event) throws IOException
      handleDrop loads an image and displays it in view through a drag and drop action if any type of files is dragged except an image we throws IlligalArgumentException
      Parameters:
      DragEvent - event this method has one parameter loading an image in view
      Throws:
      IOException
